title: Cutey Honey Flash: The Movie
ending_song: "Nakechau hodo Setsunai kedo (泣けちゃうほど せつないけど)" by Mayo Okamoto (岡本真夜)
sinopse: Honey Kisaragi is a perfectly normal beautiful high school student. Until her scientist father is kidnapped by the evil organization Panther Claw, that is. But her father left behind a device she can use to transform into the red-haired sword-wielding heroine Cutey Honey.
